articles.author: Nisha Gopalan
articles.title: Tesla EU Sales Tumble Again Even as Overall EV Registrations Rise - Investopedia
articles.description: Tesla sales in the European Union tumbled for a second consecutive month in February, even as overall new battery-electric vehicle registrations increased.
